title: MetaPlay
author: MetaPlay
created_time: October 28, 2022, 10:17:05 PMLast edit: October 28, 2022, 11:58:49 PM by MetaPlay
content: MetaPlay is a Blockchain-based poker game that uses the BSC network and integrates metaverse elements into the gameplay.Important part of the gameplay are unique NFTs directly affecting the player's level, his gaming experience and giving access to tournaments of high level.MetaPlay has opportunity to make bets at the poker table in any cryptocurrency that is convenient for you and automatically converts them into the game token MPT (at this stage the technology is in testing phase).MetaPlay is developed on BSC blockchain and has the ability to control the fairness of the game.We implement many elements in the gameplay such as:SpinAt the beginning of each round of the tournament all participating players may have an opportunity to get a unique bonus (NFT, game reward or other)Game RewardAt the end of each month we summarize the results of all past tournaments, and players with the most points receive from us game bonuses in the form of MPT tokensMetaverseAt the beginning of 2023 we plan to launch a full game universe presented in 3D. There you can choose and customize your avatar according to your preferences and how you would like it to look.In the future we plan to add more and more features to our game universe giving you more freedom of choice!Get your one-of-a-kind free NFT! Try our app and get your free NFT as a bonus!Web Site:MetaPlaySocial Link:Telegram   Medium   Discord   Twitter   RedditOur Roadmap
